table.name: vtiger_servicelevelagrrements
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicelevelagrrements` ( `servicelevelagrrementsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `category` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `sub_category` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `sla_hours` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicelevelagrrementsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_servicelevelagrrementscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicelevelagrrementscf` ( `servicelevelagrrementsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicelevelagrrementsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
